member.name: IMFMediaKeys.CreateSession
member.summary: Creates a media key session object using the specified initialization data and custom data. .
member.param: The MIME type of the media container used for the content.
The initialization data for the key system.
The count in bytes of initData.
Custom data sent to the key system.
The count in bytes of cbCustomData.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaKeys.GetSuspendNotify
member.summary: Gets the suspend notify interface of the Content Decryption Module (CDM).
member.param: The suspend notify interface of the Content Decryption Module (CDM).
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaKeys.get_KeySystem
member.summary: Gets the key system string the object was created with.
member.param: The string name of the key system.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaKeys.Shutdown
member.summary: Shuts down the associated Content Decryption Module (CDM).
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaKeys
member.summary: Represents a media keys used for decrypting media data using a Digital Rights Management (DRM) key system.
